'utf8');Â Â Â Â }}

Â Â Â Â Â Â constÂ loopCountÂ =Â totalÂ /Â onceÂ Â Â Â Â Â letÂ countOfRenderÂ =Â 0

<!DOCTYPEÂ html><htmlÂ lang="en"><head>

Â Â <script>

Â Â Â Â Â Â functionÂ loop()Â {
